page.title: 14CHILDREN-VIEWS ON TEANASSIE
page.content: LIKES Most of us like this area because there is a lot of lovely nature to learn about and there are safe places to play and walk.The trees are very popular because we can climb them.People like the country school they go to. DISLIKES The majority of us feel sad about the destruction of nature.Lots of us dislike the cutting down of trees because animals and birds are made homeless-think-if you woke up and there were no birds chirping.Others have different ideas.Some dislike the dangers of the narrow,twisting roads. A lot of people live along way from friends.It can get very boring.This area is out of the way and it is very difficult to get to hospitals and doctors quickly.
